overview.base: You gain Climbing and Leaping.
You climb at half speed.
overview.proficient: You instead climb at normal speed.

overview.base: You vertically leap at quarter speed and horizontally leap at half speed.
overview.proficient: You instead vertically leap at half speed and horizontally leap at full speed.

overview.base:
Can wield two-handed weapons in one hand.
Note: AP weapons must still be wielded in two hands to be AV0.
When you use Hitman, you may instead prepare an area up to 15 feet by 15 feet. In addition, you resist being surprised in towns and other urban areas. You also gain Reactive Hide.
overview.proficient: The size of area you can prepare is (P + 2) × 5 feet by (P + 2) × 5 feet.
overview.fluent: The size of area you can prepare is (F + 2) × 5 feet by (F + 2) × 5 feet.

overview.base: You become hidden.

Your feet count as weapons for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by them (although they cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may attack with them and their damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/damage 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/damage 1d8]].

overview.base: You cannot use items in your hands.
Target takes an additional [[/damage 5[lethal]]] damage. This also has all damage types of the triggering attack. If the triggering attack was a critical hit, this deals 10 damage instead.

system.trigger: You have just hit a creature with an attack that dealt them damage from it.

overview.base: You swim at full speed.
You gain Bite and become fluent in it. Additionally, your mouth is AV0.

Your mouth counts as a weapon for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by it (although it cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may attack with it and its damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/damage 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/damage 1d8]].

overview.base: You gain Offensive Martial Arts and become fluent in it. Additionally, your hands are AV0. If you have Hind Claws, you become fluent in it as well and your feet are AV0.

Your hands count as weapons for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by (although they cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may attack with them and their damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/damage 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/damage 1d8]].
